title: Aranea

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prepare to dive into someone's thoughts during the day. That night, you will be able to secretly read everything sent in their private channel.
- At night, choose to roleblock your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Halfway through the night, your target will be informed that their mind has been infested.
- With the Necronomicon, you have more options with what to do with your target.
> - Blackmail them.
> - Control them. (identical to (99) Witch)
> - Have them deal a Powerful attack to themselves. This does not prevent their normal action.
